title: Discount skins not selling at sidcount price
body:
I recently purchased PickPocket Twitch from the discount Teemoing store (i think thats what its called) and it was at 70% off meaning it would be 225 and not the regular 750 RP, i had 1517 rp or so and after i purchased the discounted skin it took the 750 rp instead of the 225

PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support, as we cannot help you with account specific enquiries here on boards. I tmay take them a couple days to get back to you though so be prepared to wait a little ok? Best of luck to you :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
